label: 島田忠臣
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (828-891). Also known as Den Tatsuon 田達音. Prose composition in Honchō monzui. Private collection Denshi kashū 田氏家集. Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集(5), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (5). [本朝文粋、漢詩]
